sn45.134-138:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yamuna nadi samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.134-138:1.3: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, aciravati nadi samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.134-138:1.5: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, sarabhu nadi samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.134-138:1.7: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahi nadi samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.134-138:1.9: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ya kacima mahanadiyo, seyyathidam—
sn45.134-138:1.10: ganga, yamuna, aciravati, sarabhu, mahi, sabba ta samuddaninna samuddapona samuddapabbhara;
sn45.134-138:1.11: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn45.134-138:1.12: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn45.134-138:1.13: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti nibbananinnam nibbanaponam nibbanapabbharam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti nibbananinnam nibbanaponam nibbanapabbharam.
sn45.134-138:1.14: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
